display_name: Functional Outcomes of Sleep: Difficulty visiting family or friends in your home
description:
Item from Functional Outcomes of Sleep Questionnaire. [Weaver et. al, 1997 (Pubmed ID: 9415942)](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/9415942)

[Search for all Functional Outcomes of Sleep variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/mros/variables?search=fosq)

Original question: Do you have difficulty visiting with your family or friends in your home because you become sleepy or tired?
